cardtext:
Before engaging, you may Hustle.

After engaging, you may choose a hero in a zone adjacent to yours, and Hustle that hero into your zone.
cardtip: Before engaging, Hustle self. After engaging, Hustle ally to you.

cardtext:
Engage with +2.

After engaging: The target gains +2 Force until the beginning of your next turn.
cardtip: Engage with +2. Foe gains +2 Force.

cardtext: The next engagement you make this turn gains +1 Range.
cardtip: The next engagement you make this turn gains +1 Range.

cardtext: Prep this action: After any character you can sense rolls an engagement, you may use this prep to force them to reroll their engagement and keep the new result.
cardtip: Prep: Force any character to reroll engagement.

cardtext:
Choose an ally. You may end any one status on that ally.

Heal.
cardtip: End status on one ally, then Heal them.

cardtext:
Engage with +1 Range.

After engaging, Hustle the target closer to you.
cardtip: Engage with +1 Range. Hustle target toward you.

cardtext:
[Primary Compassion]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when an ally rolls a 1 when making an engagement.

Roll a d6, and add the result to the triggering ally's Force for this engagement.
cardtip: When engaging ally rolls 1, add 1d6.

cardtext:
Engage your target. The next time your target engages before the start of your next turn, prevent all non-damage effects of the engagement.

(Damage from the target’s engagement happens normally but side effects, such as stat penalties or
cardtip: Engage. Prevent non-damage effects of target's next engagement.

cardtext: Heal an ally. That ally gains +3 Composure for the next engagement against them before your next turn.
cardtip: Heal an ally. They get +3 Composure.

cardtext: Spend any amount of Morale, and choose another hero that can sense you. The chosen hero gains a bonus to Composure until the start of your next turn. The bonus is four times the amount of Morale you spent.
cardtip: Spend your Morale to give an ally +4 Composure per Morale spent.

cardtext: Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain an Aura: Heroes in your zone gain +2 Composure.
cardtip: Until the start of your next turn, heroes in your zone have +2 Composure.

cardtext:
[Secondary Compassion]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when a foe engages an ally you can see.

Roll a d6, and add the result to the triggering ally's Composure against this engagement.
cardtip: When ally engaged, grant +1d6 Composure.

cardtext:
[Clever/Courage Calling]

After engaging, you may Hustle any character in an adjacent zone into your zone, and then you may Hustle any character in your zone (including yourself) out of the zone.
cardtip: After engaging, Hustle someone into zone, then Hustle someone out of zone.

cardtext:
[Courage/Courage Calling]

You gain a bonus to this engagement equal to the base Force bonus of the target foe.
cardtip: Gain bonus equal to foe's Force bonus.

cardtext: Engage. If you use this technique against a foe that has triggered one of your prep actions during this encounter, then you gain an extra +1 Force for each point you spend to Surge.
cardtip: If you engage a foe who's triggered your prep, +1 per Surge.

cardtext:
[Primary Courage]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when you would be able to use a hasten action.

Hustle.
cardtip: During your turn, Hustle yourself.

cardtext:
[Secondary Clever]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

You may use this ability when your turn begins, and another character could act instead.

The turn is passed to a valid character of your choice instead of you.
cardtip: When turn is passed to you, pass to another instead.

cardtext:
Hustle.

If there are no heroes or foes in your new zone, Hustle again.

If there is at least one foe in your new zone, regain one Morale.
cardtip: Hustle, then Hustle again if new zone empty.

cardtext:
This engagement deals half damage (round up).

After engaging: Choose another hero. They gain a bonus to their next engagement before your next turn, equal to 4 times the damage dealt with this engagement.
cardtip: Deal half damage. Give ally Force bonus equal to 4 times damage dealt.

cardtext:
Before engaging: You lose one point of Morale.

Engage with +3.

Special: This technique counts as a Courage technique, and can be Surged and Combined, even though it costs no Focus.
cardtip: Pay one Morale to engage with +3.

cardtext: Choose an ally and Heal. You may choose a second ally and Heal them for the same amount the first one was healed for, without paying any Focus for the second ally.
cardtip: Heal two allies for the same amount.

cardtext:
Until the start of your next turn, the target cannot move to another zone with their hasten action as normal.

They may use their main action to move to a different zone, rather than their hasten action.
cardtip: Foe must use Main to step.

cardtext:
Prep this action: If a foe engages you, you may Jab it after its engagement resolves.

If this prep expires, you lose 1 Morale.
cardtip: Prep: If engaged, Jab. If prep expires, take 1 damage.

cardtext:
[Clever/Compassion Calling]

After engaging, until the start of your next turn, whenever you would Jab, you may instead have each ally Jab a foe of their choice.
cardtip: After engaging, if you would Jab, instead allies Jab.

cardtext:
[Compassion/Compassion Calling ]

Engage with +1 for each point of Morale you have healed to an ally this encounter. You cannot gain more than +10 in this way.
cardtip: +1 Force for each point you've healed allies.

cardtext: Engage with a bonus equal to the total number of Traits that have been revealed this encounter.
cardtip: Engage with a bonus equal to the total number of Traits that have been revealed this encounter.

cardtext: Heal an ally. If that ally is in your zone, you have +1 Heal.
cardtip: Heal ally. Heal + 1 if they're in your zone.

cardtext: Engage with +6. If this engagement does not vanquish the target, then this engagement becomes Gentle and the target’s next engagement becomes Gentle.
cardtip: Engage +6. If target not vanquished, deal no damage, and target Gentled.

cardtext:
[Secondary Courage]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when you could use any other initiative seize.

Seize initiative.
cardtip: Initiative seize.

cardtext: Engage, and after engaging: If you and the target are in the same zone, you must Hustle the target into another zone.
cardtip: Engage. If in target's zone, you may Hustle them.

cardtext:
[Clever/Clever Calling]

You may choose to lose any number of actions you have prepped. (Those actions are no longer prepped, but do not count as expiring.) You gain +2 to the engagement for each prep action you lose this way.
cardtip: Engage. You may spend preps to gain +2 per.

cardtext:
You gain +2 to all your gathering rolls at the start of your next turn.

Do not engage as part of this technique.

Since there is no engagement, you cannot Surge or Combine this technique.
cardtip: Gain +2 to next Gather. No engagement.

cardtext: Until the start of your next turn, all heroes gain +2 Force with Jabs, and all foes suffer –2 Force with Jabs.
cardtip: Heroes +2 to Jabs, foes -2 to Jabs.

cardtext:
[Courage/Clever Calling ]

You may target one extra foe with this engagement.
cardtip: Target an extra foe with this engagement.

cardtext:
Engage. You gain +3 if you have engaged the target since the start of your last turn.

After engaging: You gain +3 with the next engagement you make against the target before the end of your next turn.
cardtip: Engage. +3 if you engaged them last turn. +3 if you engage them next turn.

cardtext:
[Primary Clever]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when you would be able to use a prep action.

Choose and learn any one trait of a foe.
cardtip: Learn a trait for free.

cardtext:
Engage with +1 range.

After engaging: Hustle the target.
cardtip: Engage with +1 range, and Hustle the target.

cardtext:
Jab a foe.

(This technique counts as a Jab, so it cannot be Surged or Combined unless an effect specifically allows you to Surge or Combine <
cardtip: Jab.

cardtext:
Choose either Force or Composure, and choose an ally. The ally gains +2 to the chosen stat until the start of your next turn.

Heal.
cardtip: Heal one ally. They gain either +2 Force or +2 Composure.

cardtext: Heal an ally. Hustle that ally unless they have already been Hustled this round.
cardtip: Heal an ally. Hustle them unless they've been Hustled this round.

cardtext:
[Compassion/Clever Calling]

Make a Gentle engagement.

After engaging, choose a hero, and choose a foe. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen hero gains a Force bonus, and the chosen foe take
cardtip: Engage Gentle. Hero gains +4 Force per gentled, foe gets -4 Force per gentled.

cardtext:
Choose an ally. That ally gains +3 Force to the next engagement they make before your next turn.

Heal.
cardtip: Heal an ally. They gain +3 to their next engagement.

cardtext:
[Courage/Compassion Calling]

Before engaging, you may spend any amount of Morale, up to your current amount.

Engage with +2 for each Morale spent.
cardtip: Engage. You may spend Morale to gain +2 per.

cardtext:
[Compassion/Courage Calling ]

Engage. After engaging, you gain this Aura effect until the end of your next turn: When a foe makes an engagement while in your zone, the target of their engagement may Jab that foe.
cardtip: Engage and gain Aura: If ally in your zone is engaged, ally may Jab engaging foe.

cardtext: Prep this action: When another hero you can sense is engaged, you may grant them +2 Composure against that engagement.
cardtip: Prep: Give engaged ally +2 Composure once.

cardtext:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Courage focus.
cardtip:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Courage focus each Gathering.

cardtext:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Compassion focus.
cardtip:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Clever focus each Gathering.

cardtext:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Clever focus.
cardtip:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Clever focus each Gathering.

cardtext:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

If you lost any Hope last encounter, then you must choose Hopeful Outlook this encounter.

Hopeful Outlook prov
cardtip:
Choose this Outlook if you lost Hope last encounter.
This outlook gives no bonus.
